name: I don't want to live on this planet anymore
name_original: I don't want to live on this planet anymore
description:
You are in a toxic relationship, with Earth.

In “I don’t want to live on this planet anymore” you play as a crowperson named Mace who is preparing to leave the planet. Before you go, you decide to make one last trip to the forest to collect cigarette butts. Being part crow, you are drawn to trash and shiny things naturally, but it disgusts you because it has killed your planet.
